txt.en: 'So you found the source, hum, hoom. You have done the Wildwood a favour on this day, little friend.\n\n'I think I will stay here for a time and keep watch over these forests. You have done me a great favour as well, and I am willing to work with your Trestlebridge folk now.'
Find a good place to burn the Huorn bark
Find a good place to burn the Huorn bark
'The Wicked Holm must be stopped, lest his darkness spread throughout the land.'
Thornmane is located in southern Wildwood.\n\nYou should talk to Thornmane.

DNT - 'So you found the source, hum, hoom. You have done the Wildwood a favour on this day, little friend. \n\n'I think I will stay here for a time and keep watch over these forests. You have done me a great favour as well, and I am willing to work with your Trestlebridge folk now. '

'Hoom, hum. I have spoken with the trees and am troubled anew. They speak of poisoned roots, foul waters, and a silver-barked Huorn called, hummm, how to say it in your speech - the Wicked Holm. Take you this rotten bark and burn it on the hill nearby. I suspect the scent of the smoke will draw out the source of the poisoned shadows.\n\n'Go carefully, my little friend, room-tum. To spread its violence through so many, and so far - I fear the Wicked Holm to be a powerful foe, indeed.'
DNT - Defeat the source of the darkness
The Shadowbark Huorns are defeated, but the darkness that twisted them is still a mystery.
Summon and defeat the Wicked Holm
The Wicked Holm may be summoned by burning the shadow bark atop a hill in the south-western Wildwood.\n\nThornmane has asked you to defeat the Wicked Holm.
